Vision.subtitle: Vision
Vision.text: We strive to ensure that every children's hospital in Ukraine becomes a place of joy and smiles for children who find themselves in difficult and crisis situations.

inclusivity.hoverText: we value everyone, regardless of their circumstances, and do our best to make everyone feel important and needed

proactivity.hoverText: we take action in advance, always looking for new ways to bring joy and relief

respect.hoverText: we treat everyone with deep respect, valuing the uniqueness of each individual

sincerity.hoverText: our actions and words always come from the heart, creating an atmosphere of trust

empathy.hoverText: we understand and feel what you feel, providing support in the most difficult moments

first.text:
Hospital Clowning:
 An Emotional Support Program for Children in Hospitals
first.hoverText: Boosting children's mood and morale. Facilitating adaptation to hospital conditions. Сompanying children for procedures or surgeries. Collaborating with parents and doctors

second.hoverText: Weekly Events. Bubble Shows. Winners' Games. Beauty Days. Art Therapy. Sound Therapy. Themed Concerts

third.hoverText: Training hospital clowns.  Conducting team building for the team with the support of the international community of hospital clowns.  We work with the emotional state of volunteers.  We promote and develop hospital clowning in Ukraine

first.text: To establish an Ukrainian Association of Hospital Clowns with colleagues from cities across Ukraine

second.text: To launch new teams in children's hospitals in Kyiv and other cities

third.text: To create a national program of emotional support in children's hospitals

School.join_title: Who Can Become a Hospital Clown?

join.paragraph_1: A person who understands empathy. They are ready to accept and acknowledge the emotions of those who need support and to provide that support based on the emotional needs of children and parents.
join.paragraph_2: Someone who is not afraid to be funny. They can genuinely laugh at themselves and at this crazy life. They laugh and love it more than anything.
join.paragraph_3: A person with charisma who is willing to work on developing it.
join.paragraph_4: Someone who is ready to learn, grow, seek themselves out, and find their comedic character. They are ready to create a celebration of life in the midst of disaster.

training.title: Think there are any classes more fun than the Clown School?
training.text: We think not. Because here students play, dress up in funny costumes and dance. It's very interesting to watch how this clown magic works, when a group of adults, strangers to each other, turn into children and allow themselves to be as they feel - light, real, silly, funny, whatever!
training.paragraph_1: Volunteers undergo a two-day training in the basics of hospital clowning - on the course, students learn to express themselves, release their inner child, not be afraid to be funny, play with each other.
training.paragraph_2: Everyone can awaken their inner clown - a unique, interesting, funny character who is just exploring the world around them, but is already ready to dive into the unknown. This is the base with which you can already work and go to the departments to the children.
training.paragraph_3: After the training, volunteers go on practice to the hospital, accompanied by experienced hospital clowns.
training.paragraph_4: Over the next three months, they gather for classes once a week and delve deeper into the mechanisms of hospital clowns.
training.paragraph_5: In parallel, regular visits to hospital departments take place, under the constant supervision of trainers and psychological support
